name: Open: Direct Pathway
desc: If an ally target's AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy target, then this attack deals an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
enhanced_desc: If an ally target's AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy target, then this attack deals an additional set amount of DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
